message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe would be of great value to you. I understand its worth to you is $1,200,000, and I'm willing to offer it to you for a price that's very fair to both of us. Please consider my offer of $1,150,000. This price allows you to secure a valuable asset at a competitive rate while ensuring I receive a fair return on my investment.  Let me know your thoughts.
